step1.title: Step 1. Explore what's possible
step1.description: Find out how others have used Kumu by exploring existing public projects.
options: Hewlett Foundation's systems map of the US Democracy
Civic Canopy's stakeholder and project network
Kumu's own data visualization of the Celebrity Ice Bucket Challenge

step2.title: Step 2. Learn the essentials
step2.description: At docs.kumu.io you'll find a step-by-step guide to getting started with Kumu, along with advanced guides to all the great features available within Kumu.

step3.title: Step 3. Experiment within a free, public project
step3.description: The best way to learn is by getting your hands dirty. Create a sandbox project, hack away on it, and then delete it when you're done!

questions.title: Got questions?
questions.description: Send an email to support@kumu.io or reach out to us on Slack.

account.label: Account
account.helpText: As an Organization owner, you can also create projects on behalf of the Organization.

projectName.label: Project name
projectName.helpText: The project name defines the project's URL, so try to keep it short and memorable.

public.label: Public
public.helpText: Anyone can see this project. You choose who can contribute.

private.label: Private
private.helpText: You choose who can see and contribute to this project.

notFirstMap.title: Create a new map
notFirstMap.subtitle: What type of map would you like to create?

system.label: SYSTEM
system.description: Systems maps help you understand and engage complex issues by visualizing the underlying webs of cause and effect. Watch our systems intro video to learn more.

stakeholder.label: STAKEHOLDER
stakeholder.description: Stakeholder maps allow you to explore who's involved and how they're connected in a visually engaging way. Watch our stakeholder intro video to learn more.

sna.label: SNA
sna.description: Our SNA template is tuned for performance and can help you identify key influencers, power structures, funding flows and more. You won't have access to all the decorations in the other templates, but you'll be able to support much larger maps. Watch our SNA intro video to learn more.

other.label: OTHER
other.description: We have a number of additional templates to build from, apart from the more common Systems, Stakeholder, and SNA templates. Or you can use the custom template to start from scratch!

chooseOtherTemplate.description: Our custom template is for advanced users who want to push the limits of Kumu and don't need much hand-holding. If "code" is a four-letter word to you, you should probably stick to one of our standard templates. Watch our Custom intro video to learn more.

elementPosition.label: How do you want elements to be positioned?

floating.label: I want elements to be positioned automatically (floating)

connectionDirection.label: What type of connections should we use by default?

nameMap.label: What should we name this map?

newMap.notSure: Not sure? Watch our two-minute overview.
